es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.views

Class BoardJPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.views.BoardJPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PieceJPanel.PieceSelectionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FiniteRectBoardJPanel

    public abstract class BoardJPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements PieceJPanel.PieceSelectionListener
    A panel which manages a board. It provides basic properties & methods which every board panel should implement. This panel doesn't actually paint anything.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  BoardJPanel.PieceAppearanceMap
      An interface which dictates how should each piece be painted, determining both its color and its shape.
